description: [Raspberry Robin](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1130) attempts to identify security software running on the victim machine, such as BitDefender, Avast, and Kaspersky.(Citation: TrendMicro RaspberryRobin 2022)(Citation: HP RaspberryRobin 2024)
